citation.case_name: Board of Education of the Pawling Central School District v. Schutz

html:
537 U.S. 1227

BOARD OF EDUCATION OF THE PAWLING CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT
v.
SCHUTZ ET AL.

No. 02-946.

Supreme Court of United States.

February 24, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE SECOND CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 2d Cir. Motion of New York State School Boards Association et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 290 F. 3d 476.
